protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the ATP-dependent ligation of succinate and CoA to form succinyl-CoA (By similarity).

reference.reference_text: Furuyama K, Sassa S: Interaction between succinyl CoA synthetase and the heme-biosynthetic enzyme ALAS-E is disrupted in sideroblastic anemia. J Clin Invest. 2000 Mar;105(6):757-64.
